# tf.contrib.training.add_gradients_summaries

``` python
tf.contrib.training.add_gradients_summaries(grads_and_vars)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/training/python/training/training.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.9/tensorflow/contrib/training/python/training/training.py).

Add summaries to gradients.

#### Args:

* <b>`grads_and_vars`</b>: A list of gradient to variable pairs (tuples).


#### Returns:

The list of created summaries.
